item.title: XY Utilities v1.5.4.3
item.description:
Product: XY Utilities v1.5.4.3
Company: PRIrvin
Release Date: Fri, 17 Jan 2025 16:44:12 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Utilities for working with XY-data type (Cluster of 1D X and Y arrays).

Supported methods:
- <b>Arithmetic</b>: Add, Subtract, Multiply, Divide, Square, Log
- <b>Array</b>: Sort, Reverse, Decimate, Decimate Array, Subset, Swap X and Y, Get X and Y, Append, Restrict X Range, Remove Outliers
- <b>Signal Processing</b>: Derivative, Average, Moving Average, Interpolate, Interpolate Parameter, Resample, FFT Spectrum, FFT Power Spectrum, Symmetrize
- <b>Filters</b>: Zero Phase Low Pass, Savitsky-Golay,
- <b>Conversion</b>: Waveform to XY, XY to Waveform, 2D to XY, XY to 2D

Release Notes: Bug Fixes
- Difference Quotient calcualtes an X array with the correct length (matches DeltaY/DeltaX) (Issue #36)
- Derivative correctly calculates the sampling interval dt (previously was off by a factor 2)
item.dc:creator: PRIrvin

item.title: RemoteControl.ZMQ v1.1.2.12
item.description:
Product: RemoteControl.ZMQ v1.1.2.12
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 17 Jan 2025 15:55:45 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Override library implementing ZMQ lazy pirate reliable request reply (RRR) protocal using RemoteControl SMO framework.

Release Notes: [1.1.2]
- update dependencies
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: RemoteControl v1.2.1.8
item.description:
Product: RemoteControl v1.2.1.8
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 17 Jan 2025 15:28:33 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Parent library for sending messages to programs occupying different application instances, ie, LabVIEW running on different computers, multiple instances of LabVIEW on a single computer, or compiled applications. By itself this library does not implement a specific or even working communication protocol, but provides abstract methods that can be overridden by, for example, ZMQ, MQTT, etc.

Release Notes: [1.2.1]
- Updated dependencies
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Instrument Framework v1.14.3.19
item.description:
Product: Instrument Framework v1.14.3.19
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 17 Jan 2025 15:12:55 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: An object-oriented framework based on JKI SMOs, developed by the LevyLab at the University of Pittsburgh.

An Instrument developed using this framework will have the access to the following capabilities:

- Framework for communicating with hardware (Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL))
- Periodically polls the instrument for its settings and logs them to a PGSQL database
- Defines an API to allow external programs to control compiled instances of the application and remotely across a network (Either NI's Simple Messaging Library (STM) (deprecated in v1.9) or cross-platform protocol ZMQ (preferred beginning with v1.9))
- Provide a user interface (optional but probably desirable).
- Methods for reading and writing configuration from disk.

Release Notes: [1.14.3]
-put framework inside Instrument.lvlib, separate malleable VIs into Instrument-VIM.lvlib
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Control Experiment v1.1.1.9
item.description:
Product: Control Experiment v1.1.1.9
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 17 Jan 2025 07:43:18 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Control Experiment.lvclass]
- Control Experiment.vi
- provides a uniform way to record information about your sample & device
- record how the lockin is connected to the device
- configure the Krohn Hite amplifier
- set the base path for saving data
- configure peripheral instruments
- APIs for recording sample data, instrument status

Release Notes: [1.1.1]
- Issue #91: two bugs related to Krohn-Hite Control v2
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Transport v1.8.1.10
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.8.1.10
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 17 Jan 2025 07:40:28 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments:
- Lockin vs time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi)

Release Notes: [1.8.1]
- Issues #92: incorrect results if number of AO /= AI
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: Instrument Framework v1.14.2.17
item.description:
Product: Instrument Framework v1.14.2.17
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 15 Jan 2025 20:46:22 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: An object-oriented framework based on JKI SMOs, developed by the LevyLab at the University of Pittsburgh.

An Instrument developed using this framework will have the access to the following capabilities:

- Framework for communicating with hardware (Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL))
- Periodically polls the instrument for its settings and logs them to a PGSQL database
- Defines an API to allow external programs to control compiled instances of the application and remotely across a network (Either NI's Simple Messaging Library (STM) (deprecated in v1.9) or cross-platform protocol ZMQ (preferred beginning with v1.9))
- Provide a user interface (optional but probably desirable).
- Methods for reading and writing configuration from disk.

Release Notes: [1.14.2]
- Issue #105 and #135: modified HELP documentation (using JSON-Schema)
